items.name: Galadriel’s Edge
items.description: Long ago the great Elven king Galadriel travelled into a dark land of shadow and evil. Legends say Galadriel vanished, perhaps falling in battle or captured by his enemy, non can say for sure. What is known however is the a year after Galadriel entered the shadowed lands his horse returned home, carrying on his sword and scabbard.

customProperties.name: The Light of Dawn
customProperties.text: Whilst the sword is equipped you can cast the Light cantrip and once per day you can cast Daylight.

items.author: will

items.name: Runed Scimitar
items.description: Raiders that make their home in the desert have been known to use areas of strong elemental magic to enhance their equipment. This sword is capable of summoning the sands from the endless deserts of the plain of earth.

customProperties.name: Sand Blast
customProperties.text: Whilst equipped you can summon a blast of blinding sand causing enemies in a 15ft cone to make a DC15 Dexterity Saving Throw, failure causes the targets to make attacks with Disadvantage until the end of your next turn.

items.author: will

items.name: Golden Helmet
items.description: Heroes of great renown are capable of inspiring their fellows with powerful words and mighty actions. Sometimes those deeds empower their equipment and when they leave this world others may fight in their stead, benefitting from a mote of their power.

customProperties.name: Champions Call
customProperties.text: Once per day you can inspire your fellow warriors, all allies within 30ft gain temporary hit points equal to D6+ your Charisma modifier.

items.author: will

items.name: Fiend’s Hood
items.description: Said to be the cowl worn by executions of the nine hells, this dark item bestows a power on the user to aid in their slaughter but that takes its toll on the body over time.
items.properties: Whilst wearing this hood, if the user slays an enemy a wave of fear washes over their allies. All enemy creatures within 15ft must make a DC15 Wisdom Saving Throw.
items.author: will

items.name: Mask of the Penguin
items.description: Crafted for use at costume parties and fancy balls this magical piece of headgear allows the wearer to both elegantly disguise themselves and delight partygoers with a bit of transmutation magic.
items.properties: Once per day, whilst wearing this mask you can turn into any kind of penguin you are familiar with, if you are not familiar with any you may use the Emperor Penguin. It must be medium or smaller. This affect lasts for 2 hours.

customProperties.name: Hold Breathe
customProperties.text: The Emperor Penguin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

customProperties.name: Swimming Leap
customProperties.text: If you move at least 10ft underwater you can leap up to 20ft out of the water in a straight line.

items.author: will

items.name: Northern Traveller Chestpiece
items.description: A strong man once came to the town. He was from the north, he said. Since his chestpiece was too hot, he traded it for some clothes that were not that warm.
items.author: philcomm

items.name: Rune stone of healing
items.description: A stone with a rune on it. This is a very common rune stone in the northern regions.

customProperties.name: Healing
customProperties.text: When a drop of water is put on the stone, you can get 10hp back.

items.author: philcomm

items.name: Truthcrystal
items.description: A truth crystal is a very rare mineral found in deep caves. They are so rare, most people don't even know that they exist.

customProperties.name: Wisdom
customProperties.text: When swallowed, the stone can give you an answer to a question you have.

items.author: philcomm

items.name: Greaves of Traipsing
items.description: These solid, ornate, metallic boots feel surprisingly light once donned, even though they still clang heavily while walking around in them.
items.properties: While wearing these shoes, you receive no penalty for moving through difficult terrain. Additionally, while standing on difficult terrain, you can perform a special Kick melee attack with advantage. If it hits, the opponent will be forced to make their next Attack at a disadvantage. This attack can be used once per short rest. Due to the loud clanging, you must make your stealth checks at a disadvantage.
items.author: sagan

items.name: Dinaro's Lost Spear
items.description: In his last battle, King Dinaro, ruler of the sea people, lost his spear. It fell into the ocean. Nobody saw it ever since.
items.author: philcomm
